string.description: The Brightness button text
string.name: brightness

string.description: Comfort Mode is Off. Comfort Mode adds a blue hue to the screen for additional eye comfort during longer usage sessions
string.name: comfort_mode_off

string.description: Comfort Mode is On. Comfort Mode adds a blue hue to the screen for additional eye comfort during longer usage sessions.
string.name: comfort_mode_on

string.description: Do Not Disturb mode is Off. In Do Not Disturb mode, we disable incoming calls, text messages and other phone-related notifications.
string.name: do_not_disturb_off

string.description: Do Not Disturb mode is On. In Do Not Disturb mode, we disable incoming calls, text messages and other phone-related notifications.
string.name: do_not_disturb_on

string.description: Title for Exit to Oculus Home prompt
string.name: exit_to_home

string.description: Body 1 for health and safety warning prompt
string.name: health_safty_warning_description1

resources.string: Read and follow all warnings and instructions included with the Gear VR before use. Gear VR should be calibrated for each user. Not for use by children under 13. Remain seated or stationary when using the Gear VR. Stop use if you experience any discomfort or health reactions.

string.description: Body 2 for health and safety warning prompt
string.name: health_safty_warning_description2

string.description: Body 3 for health and safety warning prompt
string.name: health_safty_warning_description3

string.description: Title for health and safety warning prompt
string.name: health_safty_warning_title

string.description: Warning when device reaches Level 1 thermal limit
string.name: instr1_cool_down_l1

resources.string: Your Gear VR needs to cool down to maintain optimal performance.

string.description: Warning when device reaches Level 1 thermal limit
string.name: instr2_cool_down_l1

string.description: Tutorial instruction for back button
string.name: instr_back_btn

string.description: Tutorial instruction for Brightness slider
string.name: instr_brightness

resources.string: Controls the brightness of your screen.

string.description: Tutorial instruction for Comfort Mode toggle button
string.name: instr_comfort_mode

resources.string: Changes your screen\'s color palette to a warmer look.

string.description: Warning when device reaches Level 2 thermal limit
string.name: instr_cool_down_l2

resources.string: Please remove your mobile device and let it cool down before resuming.

string.description: Tutorial instruction for Do Not Disturb toggle button
string.name: instr_do_not_disturb

resources.string: Blocks phone call and text message interruptions.

string.description: Tutorial instruction for Oculus Home button
string.name: instr_home

string.description: Tutorial instruction for Passthrough Camera toggle button
string.name: instr_passthrough_camera

string.description: Tutorial instruction to reach global menu from any where
string.name: instr_reaching_global_menu

resources.string: Remember, you can reach this at any time by holding the Back button. Gaze over each of the items below to continue.

string.description: Tutorial instruction for Reorient button
string.name: instr_reorient

resources.string: Centers your screen to the direction you\'re facing.

string.description: negative response in prompts
string.name: no

string.description: The Oculus Home button text
string.name: oculus_home

string.description: Passthrough Camera is Off. Passthrough will let people use the rear-facing camera to see the world outside of the headset.
string.name: passthrough_camera_off

string.description: Passthrough Camera is On. Passthrough will let people use the rear-facing camera to see the world outside of the headset.
string.name: passthrough_camera_on

string.description: The Reorient button text
string.name: reorient

string.description: This is a tooltip that tells the user they can swipe on the touchpad to browse through folders. It is accompanied by arrows indicated the direction to swipe.
string.name: swipe_to_browse

string.description: Tutorial instruction for back button
string.name: title_back_btn

string.description: Tutorial instruction title for Brightness slider
string.name: title_brightness

string.description: Tutorial instruction title for Comfort Mode toggle button
string.name: title_comfort_mode

string.description: Tutorial instruction title for Do Not Disturb toggle button
string.name: title_do_not_disturb

string.description: Tutorial instruction title for Oculus Home button
string.name: title_home

string.description: Tutorial instruction title for Passthrough Camera toggle button
string.name: title_passthrough_camera

string.description: Tutorial instruction title for Reorient button
string.name: title_reorient

string.description: positive response in prompts
string.name: yes
